description.value:
A Single Night's Accomodation in a Down Cell, Single-Lodge Room, Mid Cabin, or somewhere else that is mostly safe if lacking in luxury.

Requirements

Cost of service may vary with location and the honesty/charitability of those that offer it.

Effect: Common

Notes: 20 T
